about_the_game:
About World of Titans

Valendar is in danger, the dark ruler Valakaar is attempting his return, and must be stopped at all costs. Create your very own Titan and take up arms to prepare for his return. World of Titans features a plethora of fun and exciting features that takes players back to the basics of MMO's. Choose your race, select your class and level your way through adventure. With endgame content and plans for expansions, we aim to build an entirely new world that can be explored and conquered!


Choose your Class

Choose what class best fits your play style, ranging from melee to ranged, you will be given the chance to choose your class before starting your journey. These classes are Warrior, Hunter, Necromancer, Cleric, Druid & Assassin. All fit with a variety of different skills, talents, abilities and play styles. It's up to YOU how you choose to play it!


Adventure & Danger

The world is full of undiscovered secretes and adventure, filled with dungeons, raids, world bosses, treasures and discoverable items! Travel the massive world and seek out these opportunities! Group up with fellow Titans and take on mighty dungeons that will test your skills, succeed and you shall be greatly rewarded! Upon hitting max level, collect raid tokens that will then allow you access to group up and take on mighty raids, truly challenging battles but provide very rare and mighty rewards!
detailed_description:
Join fellow Titans


About the Game

About World of Titans

Valendar is in danger, the dark ruler Valakaar is attempting his return, and must be stopped at all costs. Create your very own Titan and take up arms to prepare for his return. World of Titans features a plethora of fun and exciting features that takes players back to the basics of MMO's. Choose your race, select your class and level your way through adventure. With endgame content and plans for expansions, we aim to build an entirely new world that can be explored and conquered!


Choose your Class

Choose what class best fits your play style, ranging from melee to ranged, you will be given the chance to choose your class before starting your journey. These classes are Warrior, Hunter, Necromancer, Cleric, Druid & Assassin. All fit with a variety of different skills, talents, abilities and play styles. It's up to YOU how you choose to play it!


Adventure & Danger

The world is full of undiscovered secretes and adventure, filled with dungeons, raids, world bosses, treasures and discoverable items! Travel the massive world and seek out these opportunities! Group up with fellow Titans and take on mighty dungeons that will test your skills, succeed and you shall be greatly rewarded! Upon hitting max level, collect raid tokens that will then allow you access to group up and take on mighty raids, truly challenging battles but provide very rare and mighty rewards!
name: World of Titans MMORPG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 Cores, 3.0 GHz processor 4th Generation Intel® Core™ Haswell AMD Ryzen™ Zen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 12 capable 3 GB GPU NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 900 series AMD™ GCN 4th gen Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 6 Cores, 3.5 GHz processor 8th Generation Intel® Core™ Coffee Lake AMD Ryzen™ Zen 2
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 12 capable 8 GB GPU NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX AMD RDNA™ 2 Intel® Arc™ 7 Graphics
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Explore a thrilling, open-world MMO full of adventure, pve, pvp, raids, dungeons and so much more! This new MMORPG brings a whole new play style to the mmo genre.
